description: This is the root index file for the App2AppProvider module, exporting modules and classes for external use. It re-exports from './types' and the 'App2AppProvider' class from './provider'.

classes.name: App2AppProvider
classes.description: Main provider class managing registration, invocation, response handling, error handling, and connection cleanup for inter-service communication.

methods.name: registerProvider
methods.description: Registers or unregisters a provider capability with a specific context based on input parameters.

methods.name: invokeProvider
methods.description: Initiates an invocation of a provider capability, creating and returning a correlation ID.

methods.name: handleProviderResponse
methods.description: Processes successful responses from providers, correlating responses with requests via correlation ID.

methods.name: handleProviderError
methods.description: Processes error responses from providers, ensuring proper error propagation and correlation management.

methods.name: onConnectionDetached
methods.description: Cleans up provider registrations and correlations related to a disconnected connection ID.
